lines.text: The fire... somehow distracted the police... from the bottle of blood!
That's right! It was some trick by the culprit to replace the blood with a fake!
They stole that extra-virgin virgin's blood for themselves, and replaced it with a clever decoy!
Wait, wait, wait. What's all this mean?
It means that blood right there is a fake!
And since it's a fake, and not relevant to the case, that means I can just-
For Pete's sake. No, you can't have the deuced blood.
